titles.title: Authorizing the use of the Capitol grounds for the Greater Washington Soap Box Derby.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development Discharged.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 104-150.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 61.

action.text: Mr. Gilchrest asked unanimous consent to consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 3/10/1995--Introduced. Permits the Greater Washington Soap Box Derby Association to sponsor a free public event, soap box derby races, on the Capitol grounds on July 15, 1995.
